vgp.iterate.pythagoreanTree

Class PjPythagoreanTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.object.PsObject
      • jv.project.PjProject
        • vgp.iterate.pythagoreanTree.PjPythagoreanTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, PsTimeListenerIf, PsUpdateIf, PvPickListenerIf

    public class PjPythagoreanTree
extends PjProject
    Computes a Pythagorean tree which is recursively generated from a simple trunk.
    Since:
    JavaView 3.95
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
